explanation: [0-0] In a modern kitchen, a young man wearing a mint green T-shirt and pinkish-white pants is standing by the kitchen island. There are two slices of bread on a white plate on the island. The man is holding a bottle of ketchup in his hand.

[0-6] Then the man opens the lid of the ketchup bottle. A large amount of water bursts out of the ketchup bottle and pours onto the bread, with only a small amount of ketchup dripping onto the bread. Immediately afterwards, a large amount of water pours into the white plate. The man then closes the lid and throws the bottle onto the cabinet behind him.
